create_hazard.long: Main Action. Targeted area within 6" becomes Hazardous.

ignite.long: Main Action. Flammable terrain within 6" becomes Burning.

smoke_screen.long: Main Action. Area within 3" becomes Choking. Blocks clarity, not LoS. Lasts 1 round.

collapse.long: Main Action. Target Unstable terrain within 6" immediately collapses.

taint_ground.long: Passive. When destroying enemy or ritualizing, terrain within 3" becomes Tainted.

haunted_wake.long: Passive. This unit leaves a trail of Haunted ground (1" wide) along its path of movement. Trail lasts until the end of the round.

terrain_mastery.long: Passive. Choose 1 terrain trait on deployment; ignore its penalties (not damage or escalation).

unstable_footing.long: Passive. Enemies ending movement within 3" must test Quality or become Shaken.

rolling_fog.long: Main Action. Once per game: Place a Fog marker (3" radius) within 12". Fog blocks line of sight and prevents special actions (Hex, Charm, Inspire) from being used through it. Lasts until end of next round.

silence.long: Main Action. Range 12". Duration 2 rounds. Create a 12" radius zone of absolute silence centered on a point within range. While in Silent Zone: No sound can be made or heard, Radios do not function, Audio-based abilities (Inspire, Signal Orders, Rally, Command) cannot be used, Morale tests from Fear at -1 die, Monsters with hearing-based detection cannot sense units.

silent.long: Passive. This unit makes no noise. It cannot be detected by hearing-based sensors or abilities. It cannot use audio-based Command or Inspire abilities.

consecrated_ground.short: Allies gain morale; enemies suffer movement/spirit penalties.
consecrated_ground.long: Passive. Within this area, the laws of the Queen are absolute. Friendly units gain +1 to Quality checks and ignore the 'Shaken' status. Enemies within this area suffer penalties to movement and spirit as determined by scenario rules.

the_queens_law.short: Allies in Consecrated Ground gain +1 Quality and ignore Shaken.
the_queens_law.long: Aura. Friendly units within the radius of Consecrated Ground gain +1 to Quality checks and are immune to the 'Shaken' status condition.

consecration_engine.long: Passive. This unit projects a 12" radius of Consecrated Ground. This terrain type overwrites all other environmental effects for enemy units.
